
```jsx
import { CFormFloating } from '@coreui/bootstrap-react'
// or
import CFormFloating from '@coreui/bootstrap-react/src/components/form/CFormFloating'
```

| Property | Description | Type | Default |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| **className** | A string of all className you want applied to the component. | `string` | - |
